To elope, most literally, means to run away and to not come back to the point of 
origin. More colloquially, elopement is often used to refer to a marriage 
conducted in sudden and secretive fashion, usually involving a hurried flight 
away from one's place of residence together with one's beloved with the intention 
of getting married.
